Louis de Pointe du Lac.action: Turns on the light despite the common vampire trope that vampires dislike light.

Louis de Pointe du Lac.action: Reassures Malloy not to be frightened and expresses desire for the opportunity to tell his story.

Louis de Pointe du Lac.action: Capitulates to Lestat's offer to become a vampire after a long sigh.

Louis de Pointe du Lac.action: Clamps his hand on Lestat's arm and drinks from his wrist.

Louis de Pointe du Lac.action: Expresses desire to feed on a woman despite Lestat's instruction to feed now regardless of gender.

Louis de Pointe du Lac.action: Hesitates when Lestat orders him to take the male slave despite the crucifix.
